content.subtitle: CASE STUDY
content.title: Ivanti Replaces Clari With Aviso to Get a Single Pane of Glass

content.subtitle: TECHNOLOGY
content.description: Founded in 1985, Ivanti produces IT security, cybersecurity, IT service and asset management, and unified endpoint management software

items.title: What I loved about Aviso is how easy & simple it was to pull data from different CRM instances. Aviso took away heavy lifting for IT. Impressive!
items.description: Al Arun, Chief Customer Officer, Ivanti

content.title: Ivanti faced significant performance issues with previous provider (Clari) and replaced it with Aviso to drive revenue growth and market leadership

items.title: Challenges Faced
items.description:
• Multiple disconnected instances of Salesforce CRM acquired over time
  • Manual forecast rollup with XLS & PPT
  • Scattered data across CRM and various spreadsheets
  • Lack of deal insights into opportunities and activities
  • Complex hierarchy requirements

items.title: Solution Provided
items.description:
• Read and write back to multiple CRM instances
  • Customized access for sales reps to view their respective opportunity pipeline
  • Interactive page layouts for different instances
  • Ability to handle varying dollar values for multiple pivots
  • Dynamic views of opportunity owners as last node
  • Easy ramp to Conversational & Activity Intelligence
